title: You Might Be A Functional Atheist If... | Unapologetic 99
itunes:title: You Might Be A Functional Atheist If... | Unapologetic 99
description: You might be an atheist if…We look at the growing trend of Functional Atheism. What are the signs of a Functional Atheist even if you are a professing Christian? Join us on this episode of the Unapologetic show.
